title: The Lenny Henry Show
resume: Sitcom based around the character of wide-boy Brixton pirate radio DJ - the "crucialll!!!" Delbert Wilkins, founder of the BBC (Brixton Broadcasting Corporation).  It focus on Delbert's attempts to break into the big time.
